name: Dragonriding Basics
description:
While falling from a high location, your Dragon Isles drake extends its wings to propel you both forward.

Pointing yourself downward grants more momentum. Evening out can transfer that momentum forward.

Pointing yourself upward slows you down. When at your slowest, you will start to fall slowly toward the ground.

You also gain access to the following abilities:

Surge Forward
Flap forward.

Skyward Ascent
Flap upward.
